synopsis.text: Kakazu Kio, an ordinary high school freshman, finds his mundane life turned upside down when he encounters a captivating cat-girl named Eris during a family funeral in Okinawa. Eris, hailing from the planet Catian, is on a mission to learn about Earth and its inhabitants. Much to Kio's surprise, Eris chooses his home as her base for her Earthly exploration. But life with Eris is far from ordinary, as Kio finds himself navigating a web of secret agencies, alien worshipers, and even enemy dog-aliens, all vying to capture the alluring cat-girl. With the help of his childhood friend Manami, who dreams of joining the CIA like her father, Kio must protect Eris from these relentless pursuers. Amidst the chaos, Kio's life becomes a thrilling blend of mystery, excitement, and a touch of the exotic, as he strives to keep his enchanting feline companion safe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
